text: The Zimbabwe Football Association (ZIFA) is the governing body of football in Zimbabwe. It is in charge of the men's and the women's national teams. The association was founded in 1979. It became a member of FIFA in 1965 and CAF in 1980. Category:1979 establishments in Africa Category:Establishments in Zimbabwe Category:Football governing bodies in Africa Category:Sport in Zimbabwe Category:Organizations based in Zimbabwe
title: Zimbabwe Football Association
